title: Dadventures Autumn Hike
route: Pembroke Lodge → Isabella Plantation → Pen Ponds
details: Bring snacks, drinks, and waterproof jackets. Family-friendly pace.

title: Epping Forest Camping Night
route: High Beach → Campsite near Connaught Water
details: Tents and firewood provided. Bring warm clothing.

title: Box Hill Charity Walk
route: Stepping Stones → Broadwood’s Tower → Juniper Top
details: Fundraising walk with the kids. Donations welcome.
